pkgmetadata.longdescription: # DJANGO OUTBOX HITCOUNTProject to make hitcount information more complex. Base on https://github.com/thornomad/django-hitcount, we build advance version that make device, OS, Browser, IP Geolocation, available in your website.All you need to do is: ## In your django Environment### Install package to your environment > pip install django-outbox-hitcount### Add to INSTALLED_APPS INSTALLED_APPS = [ 'django.contrib.sites', 'outbox_hitcount', ]### Add SITE_ID in user settings.py SITE_ID = 1 USE_TZ = True # set time zone True # This setting just like django-hitcount library HITCOUNT_KEEP_HIT_ACTIVE = { 'hours': 1 } # HITCOUNT_HITS_PER_IP_LIMIT = 0 # unlimited # HITCOUNT_EXCLUDE_USER_GROUP = () # not used HITCOUNT_KEEP_HIT_IN_DATABASE = { 'days': 90 } ### Install requirements Activate your environment using > mkvirtualenv env_hitcount### Migrate to create table to your database > python manage.py migrate### Run project > python manage.py runserver on you browser : 127.0.0.1:8000
